column5: Happy Birthday Buddy.I know its on The 28th but I thought I would get a little head start. Best wishes to you on your Birthday and may you have many more. So now get out there and do some Salmon fishing. Dan
Happy Birthday Pete! Don't drink any green stuff! -Brian
Hey Peter!  Happy Birthday!  Hope you have a great long weekend/birthday.  Let's do some Salmon fishing soon....hehe.  Cliff and Bly
Happy Birfday and Best Fishes!!!   Wear "the hat"!
Have a GREAT day Pete!  Maureen
Have a good one and many more Pete
Have a good one Peter, enjoy...
....Yeah the hat looks good on ya!  Have one on me champ.
A very happy Birthday Peter, have a great holiday weekend.
Happy birdie to you Peter.  Have the bestest day!
Happy Birthday Peter.  Hope you got what you wanted.  Joey
I am so hoping that Bill super glued that hat to yer punkin head!Happy b-day to ya. Joe
Happy bday... im sure you will get the hangover I deserve.....
Hey Pete alll the best better invite me to the party Cheers!!!! Let me know about that bass tourney!! Send me a PM
